snippet: The British private equity firm CVC Capital Partners has been handsomely rewarded by its investment in Formula One, but lawsuits are now putting that investment in jeopardy.
abstract: The British private equity firm CVC Capital Partners has been handsomely rewarded by its investment in Formula One, but lawsuits are now putting that investment in jeopardy.

headline.main: Hazards of Formula One Extend Beyond the Racecourse
headline.print_headline: Hazards of Formula One Extend Beyond the Racecourse
